select * from ( SELECT comment_num, review_num, mem_num, L_NUM, comment_p, content, mem_nickname, com_date, com_update, com_delete,parent_comment_nickname FROM (
SELECT rc.comment_num, rc.review_num, rc.mem_num, rc.L_NUM, rc.comment_p, rc.content, m.mem_nickname, rc.com_date, rc.com_delete, rc.com_update, parent_member.mem_nickname AS parent_comment_nickname FROM r_comment rc JOIN member m ON rc.mem_num = m.mem_num LEFT JOIN r_comment parent_comment ON rc.comment_p = parent_comment.comment_num LEFT JOIN member parent_member ON parent_comment.mem_num = parent_member.mem_num WHERE rc.review_num = #{review_num} ) WHERE comment_p = comment_p ) START WITH comment_p = 0 CONNECT BY PRIOR comment_num = comment_p ORDER SIBLINGS BY comment_num asc
